mapper.select: select row_number() over (order by RNUM desc) row_num, RNUM, BANK_NUM, BANK_KIND, BANK_TITLE, BANK_CONTENT, BANK_HITCOUNT, TO_CHAR(BANK_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as REGDATE from( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BANK_NUM DESC) RNUM, BANK_NUM, BANK_KIND, BANK_TITLE, BANK_CONTENT, BANK_HITCOUNT, BANK_REGDATE FROM BANK ) order by row_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into bank( bank_num, bank_kind, bank_title, bank_content ) values ( bank_num_seq.nextval, #{BANK_KIND}, #{BANK_TITLE}, #{BANK_CONTENT} )
mapper.update: update bank set bank_hitcount=nvl(bank_hitcount,0)+1 where bank_num=#{BANK_NUM}
update bank set bank_kind=#{BANK_KIND}, bank_title=#{BANK_TITLE}, bank_content=#{BANK_CONTENT} where bank_num=#{BANK_NUM}

update bank set
BANK_ORIGINAL_FILE1=null, BANK_STORED_FILE1=null
,
BANK_ORIGINAL_FILE2=null, BANK_STORED_FILE2=null
WHERE bank_num=#{BANK_NUM}
